title.narrative: Pacific Senior Health Officials Network Policy Partnership Initative

description.narrative: The Pacific Senior Health Officials Network (PSHON) facilitates communication between senior health officials in the Pacific and Australia with the aim of supporting health systems governance and the development and implementation of sound and effective health policies in the Pacific region. The Policy Partnerships Initiative (PPI) is an initiative of the PSHON to enable members to establish policy partnerships with health officials from Australia and/or other Pacific countries. These partnerships support capacity development in Pacific Ministries in policy areas that have been identified as key priorities by the PSHON. Funding under this initiative by the Australian Institute Health and Wealth supports Kiribati Ministry of Health to strengthen their health information system.
